cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mohan

sentence.kanji: 彼は全校生徒の模範です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha zenkou seito no mohan desu
sentence.english: He's a role model for all the students in our school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sukitooru

sentence.kanji: 湖の水は透き通っていたよ。
sentence.romaji: mizuumi no mizu ha sukitoote ita yo
sentence.english: The water of the lake was transparent.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kourei

sentence.kanji: 彼は高齢を理由に社長を辞めたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kourei wo riyuu ni shachou wo yameta yo
sentence.english: He gave up the company presidency due to age.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenrei

sentence.kanji: 彼女の年齢は27です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no nenrei ha 27 desu
sentence.english: She's 27 years old.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utagai

sentence.kanji: 彼は盗みの疑いをかけられたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nusumi no utagai wo kakerareta no
sentence.english: He was suspected of the theft.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utagau

sentence.kanji: なぜあなたは私を疑うのですか。
sentence.romaji: naze anata ha watashi wo utagau no desu ka
sentence.english: Why do you doubt me?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utagawashii

sentence.kanji: 疑わしい場所は全部調べよう。
sentence.romaji: utagawashii basho ha zenbu shirabeyou
sentence.english: Let's search in all the suspicious places.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mejirushi

sentence.kanji: 私の家は赤い屋根が目印です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ie ha akai yane ga mejirushi desu
sentence.english: My house has a red roof that's easy to spot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ifuku

sentence.kanji: 彼の会社は衣服を扱っているよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no kaisha ha ifuku wo atsukate iru yo
sentence.english: His company deals with clothing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitodoori

sentence.kanji: ここは人通りが激しいね。
sentence.romaji: koko ha hitodoori ga hageshii ne
sentence.english: A lot of people pass through here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoumi

sentence.kanji: 私は歴史に興味があります。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha rekishi ni kyoumi ga arimasu
sentence.english: I'm interested in history.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koufun

sentence.kanji: 彼女の優勝に感激し興奮しました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no yuushou ni kangeki shi koufun shimashita
sentence.english: I was excited and moved by her victory.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meijiru

sentence.kanji: 急に出張を命じられました。
sentence.romaji: kyuu ni shuchou wo meijiraremashita
sentence.english: I was suddenly sent on a business trip.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yajirushi

sentence.kanji: 矢印にそって歩いてください。
sentence.romaji: yajirushi ni sote aruite kudasai
sentence.english: Please follow the arrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toosu

sentence.kanji: 針に糸を通してください。
sentence.romaji: hari ni ito wo tooshite kudasai
sentence.english: Please thread the needle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reitan

sentence.kanji: 彼は彼女に冷淡な態度をとったね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kanojo ni reitan na taido wo tota ne
sentence.english: He took a cold-hearted attitude toward her.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiki

sentence.kanji: 地球環境の危機が叫ばれているのよ。
sentence.romaji: chikyuu kankyou no kiki ga sakebarete iru no yo
sentence.english: There's an outcry over a world-wide environmental crisis.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryouiki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は料理の腕が素人の領域を超えているわ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ryouri no ude ga shirouto no ryouiki wo koete iru wa
sentence.english: Her cooking skills go beyond the range of an amateur.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toorikakaru

sentence.kanji: その店を通り掛かったらバーゲンをやっていた。
sentence.romaji: sono mise wo toorikakatara ba-gen wo yateita 。
sentence.english: When I happened to pass the shop they were having a sale.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's henkyaku

sentence.kanji: 図書館に本を返却したよ。
sentence.romaji: toshokan ni hon wo henkyaku shita yo
sentence.english: I returned the book to the library.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuukan

sentence.kanji: 彼女はとても勇敢でした。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha totemo yuukan deshita
sentence.english: She was very brave.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reika

sentence.kanji: 今日は零下の寒さでしたね。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha reika no samusa deshita ne
sentence.english: The cold was below zero today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukusou

sentence.kanji: そのパーティーはカジュアルな服装で大丈夫です。
sentence.romaji: sono pa-tei- ha kajuaru na fukusou de daijoubu desu
sentence.english: It's alright to wear casual clothes to the party.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's insatsu

sentence.kanji: 年賀状を印刷したの。
sentence.romaji: nengajou wo insatsu shita no
sentence.english: I printed New Year's cards.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taberu

sentence.kanji: 昨日タイカレーを食べました。
sentence.romaji: kinou taikare- wo tabemashita
sentence.english: I had Thai curry yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gohan

sentence.kanji: 私はパンよりご飯が好きだ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha pan yori gohan ga suki da
sentence.english: I prefer rice to bread.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nomimono

sentence.kanji: 何か飲み物が欲しいな。
sentence.romaji: nani ka nomimono ga hoshii na 。
sentence.english: I could really use something to drink.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toshokan

sentence.kanji: 図書館で料理の本を借りた。
sentence.romaji: toshokan de ryouri no hon wo karita
sentence.english: I borrowed a cookbook from the library.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's musume

sentence.kanji: 私の娘はアメリカにいます。
sentence.romaji: watashi no musume ha amerika ni imasu
sentence.english: My daughter is in the United States.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mijikai

sentence.kanji: 彼は足が短い。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ashi ga mijikai
sentence.english: His legs are short.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ii

sentence.kanji: 彼女は良い友達です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ii tomodachi desu
sentence.english: She's a good friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sake

sentence.kanji: 彼女は酒に強い。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha sake ni tsuyoi
sentence.english: She holds her liquor well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nomu

sentence.kanji: 友達とお酒を飲んでいます。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi to osake wo nonde imasu
sentence.english: I'm drinking sake with a friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atama

sentence.kanji: 今朝から頭が痛い。
sentence.romaji: kesa kara atama ga itai
sentence.english: I've had a headache since this morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's supai

sentence.kanji: このぶどうは酸っぱいです。
sentence.romaji: kono budou ha supai desu
sentence.english: These grapes are sour.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tabemono

sentence.kanji: 日本の食べ物はとても美味しいです。
sentence.romaji: nipon no tabemono ha totemo oishii desu
sentence.english: Japanese food is very delicious.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuushoku

sentence.kanji: 夕食は7時です。
sentence.romaji: yuushoku ha shichiji desu
sentence.english: Dinner's at seven o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ginkou

sentence.kanji: 銀行は3時まで開いています。
sentence.romaji: ginkou ha sanji made aite imasu
sentence.english: The bank is open until three o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ondo

sentence.kanji: 今、部屋の温度は25度だ。
sentence.romaji: ima heya no ondo ha nijuugodo da
sentence.english: This room's temperature is currently 25 degrees.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's asagohan

sentence.kanji: 七時に朝御飯を食べました。
sentence.romaji: shichiji ni asagohan wo tabemashita
sentence.english: I ate breakfast at seven o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinpai

sentence.kanji: 明日のプレゼンテーションが心配だ。
sentence.romaji: asu no purezente-shon ga shinpai da
sentence.english: I'm worried about tomorrow's presentation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagiru

sentence.kanji: このサービスは週末に限ります
sentence.romaji: kono sa-bisu ha shuumatsu ni kagirimasu
sentence.english: This service is limited to weekends.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryokan

sentence.kanji: 京都では旅館に泊まりました。
sentence.romaji: kyouto de ha ryokan ni tomarimashita
sentence.english: I stayed at an inn in Kyoto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gin

sentence.kanji: 彼は銀メダルを取った。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ginmedaru wo tota
sentence.english: He got the silver medal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haitatsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は新聞配達をしている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shinbun haitatsu wo shite iru
sentence.english: He's delivering newspapers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kubaru

sentence.kanji: 会議で書類を配った。
sentence.romaji: kaigi de shorui wo kubata
sentence.english: I handed out the document at the meeting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoparai

sentence.kanji: 彼はただの酔っ払いです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tada no yoparai desu
sentence.english: He's nothing but a drunk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoparau

sentence.kanji: 昨夜は酔っ払いました。
sentence.romaji: yuube ha yoparaimashita
sentence.english: I got drunk last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoi

sentence.kanji: 彼は良いところだけを強調した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yoi tokoro dake wo kyouchou shita
sentence.english: He only emphasized the strong points.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kisetsu

sentence.kanji: 私の一番好きな季節は春です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ichiban suki na kisetsu ha haru desu
sentence.english: My favorite season is spring.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taishikan

sentence.kanji: 彼は大使館に勤めています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha taishikan ni tsutomete imasu
sentence.english: He's working for the embassy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taiin

sentence.kanji: 母が今日退院します。
sentence.romaji: haha ga kyou taiin shimasu
sentence.english: My mother is being discharged from the hospital today.
